title: OXO Fish Turner
description: The OXO Good Grips Fish Turner lets you lift, flip and transfer fish while keeping it intact. Use this handy tool on whole fish, filets, seafood cakes and more. The beveled edge slides easily beneath foods and the slots in the head allow grease to drain. The durable, stainless steel head is oversized for larger fish and the soft handle allows for a comfortable grip.

asset.title: OXO Fish Turner

http://www.oxo.com/p-525-fish-turner.aspx

The OXO Good Grips Fish Turner lets you lift, flip and transfer fish while keeping it intact. Use this handy tool on whole fish, filets, seafood cakes and more. The beveled edge slides easily beneath foods and the slots in the head allow grease to drain. The durable, stainless steel head is oversized for larger fish and the soft handle allows for a comfortable grip.
asset.author: OXO

transcripts: If you've ever tried flipping a delicate fillet of fish, and ended up with a broken floppy mess, you know the challenge of keeping a fillet beautiful from the fish market to the table. The OXO fish turner lets you lift, flip, and transfer fish while keeping it intact. Use this handy tool on whole fish, fillets, seafood cakes , and more. The beveled edge slides easily beneath the foods, while the slots in the head allow for grease to drain. The durable stainless steel head is over sized for larger fish while the soft handle allows for a comfortable grip even when it's wt or oily. When you're done, it can go right into the dishwasher. Here's a good tip, don't stop with seafood. The fish turner is slender and sturdy which also makes it great for omelets.
